summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to funding positions in the Police Department; authorizing a grant agreement with the United States Department of Justice for financial assistance under the Police Hiring Supplement Program; accepting money when received; establishing positions in the Police Department; increasing expenditure allowances in the 1994 Budget of the Police Department; making a partially reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund; and declaring the emergency therefor, all by three-fourths vote of the City Council.
